The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 02 January is 18,969 (2,195.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 December, there were 3,366 new confirmed cases (389.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 December, there were 2,379 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 41% (987 extra cases).
